document_title: Hydatid disease: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: san-lon-gao.json_6_At what temperature does rice fluke die?
subsection_content: If you cook pork at a temperature of 75 degrees Celsius for 5 minutes or at a temperature of 100 degrees Celsius for more than 2 minutes, the larvae or rice tapeworms will die.; However, it is best to destroy pork immediately and not risk processing.
subsection_title: san lon gao.json. At what temperature does rice fluke die?
subsection_data:
san lon gao.json. At what temperature does rice fluke die?
If you cook pork at a temperature of 75 degrees Celsius for 5 minutes or at a temperature of 100 degrees Celsius for more than 2 minutes, the larvae or rice tapeworms will die.; However, it is best to destroy pork immediately and not risk processing.
